dcterms:description: A public dataset comprising 70 meal sessions from 70 participants, containing 4,132 eating gestures and 893 drinking gestures, collected using FMCW radar for fine-grained intake gesture detection.
dcterms:title: Public Dataset for Fine-Grained Eating and Drinking Gesture Detection

dcterms:creator: Y. Xie
R. Jiang
X. Guo
Y. Wang
J. Cheng
Y. Chen
dcterms:description: The mmEat dataset focuses on millimeter wave-enabled eating behavior monitoring, providing data for various eating styles and behaviors.
dcterms:title: mmEat Dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
Y. Chen
S. Shirmohammadi
C. Hsu
dcterms:description: AI-assisted dataset for food intake activity recognition using 3D mmWave radars, focusing on detecting eating and drinking activities.
dcterms:title: AI-assisted Food Intake Activity Recognition Dataset
